# [Interview #691: Ancient 17th Shard Question and Answer, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=691#28)

#### Chaos

Does atium have a "side effect", much like how lerasium has a "side effect" in creating Mistborn?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO
